v.desc: The least recent time at which the database account can be restored to (ISO-8601 format).
The least recent time at which the database account can be restored to (ISO-8601 format).

includedPaths.desc: Paths of the item that need encryption along with path-specific settings.

clientEncryptionKeyId.desc: The identifier of the Client Encryption Key to be used to encrypt the path.

encryptionAlgorithm.desc: The encryption algorithm which will be used. Eg - AEAD_AES_256_CBC_HMAC_SHA256.

encryptionType.desc: The type of encryption to be performed. Eg - Deterministic, Randomized.

pth.desc: Path that needs to be encrypted.

policyFormatVersion.desc: Version of the client encryption policy definition. Please note, user passed value is ignored. Default policy version is 1.
